title: BRIEF-FIS Q4 EPS $2.93 From Continuing Operations
text:
FIS Q4 EPS $2.93 From Continuing Operations   Fidelity National Information Services Inc : 
* FIS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND 2018 GUIDANCE 
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.36 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.93 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE FELL 4.7 PERCENT TO $2.329 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.10 TO $5.30 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.00 TO $3.35 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.91, REVENUE VIEW $9.20 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.34, REVENUE VIEW $2.36 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES 2018 CONSOLIDATED GAAP REVENUE DECREASE OF 1.5 PERCENT TO 2.5 PERCENT 
* SEES 2018 NON-GAAP CONSOLIDATED ORGANIC REVENUE INCREASE OF 2.5 PERCENT TO 3.5 PERCENT
